WindowWebkitConvertPointFromPageToNode.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated Given a specified in the page's coordinate system, the
method webkitConvertPointFromPageToNode()
returns a Point object specifying the same location in the coordinate
system of the specified DOM .

blockquote.para:
Warning: Please review the Browser compatibility section before using this method,
as it's not widely supported (nor is the object it uses).

remarks.para:
-
-Mozilla implementation bug: Firefox bug 850808
-webkitConvertPointFromPageToNode documentation at IE Dev Center

WindowWebkitConvertPointFromPageToNode.returns:
A Point object describing the specified location in the node's coordinate
system.
